title: The Word of God Made Flesh
itunes:title: The Word of God Made Flesh
description: Today's Gospel comes again from the sixth chapter of John. Here Christ discusses the necessity and reality of the Eucharist as the Word of God made Flesh.
content:encoded: Today's Gospel comes again from the sixth chapter of John. Here Christ discusses the necessity and reality of the Eucharist as the Word of God made Flesh.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
